sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>bundle</radical> of <radical>geoduck</radical>s, swirling around their weird shapes, and creating <kanji>rapids</kanji>! The rapids are so violent, some of the geoducks break out of the bundle and get washed into the <kanji>shallows</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Picture the bundle of geoducks getting smashed by the tsunami, breaking apart, and getting tossed around in the rapids.
readingMnemonic: After being washed through the <kanji>rapids</kanji> and into the <kanji>shallows</kanji>, the living geoducks are screaming “<reading>Save</reading> (<ja>せ</ja>) me! Save me!” They need to be saved from the water, and you are the only one who can save them. You gotta run over and help them out.
readingInfo: Imagine reaching into the shallows and saving the geoducks as they scream, “Save me! Save me!” into your ear.
